Class CommonMailMessage

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.mail.internet.MimePart, javax.mail.Part

    public class CommonMailMessage
extends BaseMailMessage
    Type Name : CommonMailMessage Author : adelwin.handoyo Created : AM 11:59:55 The sequence of the mail interface file is : 1. from 2. from name 3. reply to address 4. sent date 5. to address, comma separated 6. subject 7. body 8. mail trailer 9. attachment required 10. attachment file 11. digital signature required 12. cc 13. bcc
